words.source: H935 (בּוֹא, qal wayyiqtol 3mp) with conjunctive waw; KJV/ESV/NASB 'came'
H7462 (רָעָה, qal participle masculine plural absolute) with article; KJV 'the shepherds', ESV 'the shepherds', NASB 'the shepherds'
H1644 (גָּרַשׁ, piel wayyiqtol 3mp + 3mp suffix) with conjunctive waw; KJV 'drove them away', ESV 'drove them away', NASB 'drove them away'
H6965 (קוּם, qal wayyiqtol 3ms) with conjunctive waw; KJV 'stood up', ESV 'stood up', NASB 'stood up'
H3467 (יָשַׁע, hiphil wayyiqtol 3ms + 3fp suffix) with conjunctive waw; KJV 'helped them', ESV 'saved them', NASB 'helped them'
H8248 (שָׁקָה, hiphil wayyiqtol 3ms) with conjunctive waw; KJV 'watered', ESV 'watered', NASB 'watered'
H853 (אֵת, direct object marker); untranslated in English
H6629 (צֹאן, noun common feminine singular construct + 3mp suffix); KJV/ESV/NASB 'their flock'
